Description:
The Perfect Place to Create Your Future!
This is where the dream begins! Fully-titled, this generous Highlands allotment provides an ideal blank canvas on which to build your brand-new home with its uniform dimensions, minimal gradient & prime location in one of Craigieburn's favourite new neighbourhoods.
Approximately 337m2 in total (13.5m frontage x 25m depth), the block offers all the space required to bring the design of your dreams to reality & is ideally situated to take full
advantage of Highlands' impressive masterplan amenities.
Highlander Drive buses at the end of the street, it also offers close proximity to Craigieburn's expanding range of kinder/childcare facilities, primary & secondary schools, popular parks, playgrounds & shopping centres, as well as easy access to both Mickleham Road & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Brand New 4 Bedroom Home
Located in Kinbrook estate, this home is perfect in every way. Kinbrook has plenty of room for you and your family to grow. With landscaped parks nestled throughout the neighbourhood and a wide range of quality, local amenity and transport options at your doorstep you'll feel like you belong in this family centred community. With trusted schools, fabulous shops and quality sporting facilities you will have everything you could ever possibly need within easy reach.
This stunning new 4 bedroom home is sure to impress. A home designed to offer a free flowing vibe it offers a lifestyle aspect with minimal maintenance in mind.
Consisting of a Master bedroom with full ensuite & BIR'S, 3 other bedrooms with BIR'S ideal for the growing family.
From the moment you step inside this home, you'll feel the world of luxury and great details around the house.. Comprising of an open plan family living area along with top stone bench tops in the kitchen.
Perfect for any size family or a property investor!
Features include:
High ceilings
Down lights
Evaporative cooling
Ducted heating
Low-maintenance backyard
Quality kitchen with top stone bench tops
Double garage with remote controlled door
Landscaping front and back are for illustration.....
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
READY TO BUILD - 576m2 approx.
A fantastic and unique opportunity to secure one of the best titled blocks in the most sought after Merrifield Estate in Mickleham.
Measuring a generous 576m2, with its super-wide 18 meter front making this the perfect home site to let your imagination run wild. This location is close to all amenities including school, childcare, shopping centre etc.
• Merrifield is Victoria's largest mixed-use community.
• Just 30kms north of Melbourne CBD and 20 minutes from Melbourne Airport.
• Easy access to Hume Freeway
Call now to secure this block

Description:
Modern Luxury with superb views.
This neat and complete home offers room for the whole family both inside and out. The home includes four large bedrooms, two bathrooms, formal lounge as well as large open plan living/dining area and double car lock up garage with side access. Upgrades for this property include stone benchtops, window splash back, a great sized pantry, 900mm stainless cooker, dishwasher and range hood, gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling, security cameras and much, much more.
Outside you will be pleased with a great alfresco area overlooking superb views back to Mickleham the perfect backdrop with privacy. The yard is big enough for the kids to play or help in the established veggie garden. If location is what you're looking for, this property is perfectly positioned within the prestigious Mandalay Estate.

Description:
TITELD LAND READY TO BUILD 14mX25m......
350sqm
14m frontage X 25m Depth
Titled and eligible for the $25k Home Builder grant
Your dream home awaits at Botanical a masterplanned community located in the heart of Mickleham. Just minutes from the Donnybrook train station and the Hume Highway only 7.5km to Craigieburn's Highlands shopping complex, and 19km to Melbourne Airport.
Don't miss your chance to build your dream home! You will enjoy all the benefits of a lifestyle located close to established schools, shopping centres, medical facilities and sporting clubs in Mickleham and Craigieburn, as well as the future Mickleham city centre which will be less than a five minutes drive from home.
To find out more contact Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542

Brand Spanking New
Located in the very popular Trijena Estate, walking stroll to parklands, this Beautiful home ticks all the boxes.
Comprising of 4 bedrooms, master bedrooms with WIR and en-suites, kitchen with quality stone bench tops 900mm stainless-steel appliances. The living area will fit the whole family whilst over looking the central dining area.
approximately 23.6 sq of living
Other features include - ducted vacuum, ducted heating, Central cooling, alarm system, visual intercom, single lock up garage with remote control and internal access, low maintenance front and back gardens and much more. An inspection is a must and surely will not disappoint.

Located in the ever popular Mandalay Estate in Beveridge, this 480m² (approx.) block of land offers so much to its new owners. Be quick as this one will not last. Call Tim today on 0428 807 080

Description:
Great Family Home on 692sqm allotment
Sitting on a generous 692sqm allotment and situated in a quiet & peaceful located with walking distance to the main road and close proximity to all major amenities. This magnificent single storey home featuring 2 separate living zones including formal lounge, fully renovated kitchen with Caesar stone bench top & S/Steel appliances that overlooks meals and family area with access to outdoor entertaining area and plenty of room for the growing family to enjoy, 4 good size bedrooms (master with full ensuite and all with BIR's), central bathroom, separate toilet, spacious laundry, double garage with internal access and drive through access and plenty of room to accommodate more vehicles.
Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2xsplit systems, security shutters, s/steel appliances, dishwasher, 2xsheds and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

5 bedrooms Master with full En-Suite

High ceilings
Kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher

Description:
Amazing Opportunity on 626m2*
First time offered for sale is this much loved and cherished family home. Impeccably presented, this proud beauty is perfect for all home buyers & investors alike.
Conveniently tucked away in a whisper quiet court, enter a flexible floorplan which comprises 4 spacious bedrooms all with ceiling fans, (master bedroom with walk-in-robe & private ensuite), central bathroom, front formal living room, large kitchen with great bench space & storage, adjoining bright meals leading to an over sized family room spilling out to a wonderful large undercover pergola area perfect for the all seasons entertainer.
Features include, heating, cooling, alarm system, double carport, established gardens, private rear yard with 2 storage sheds & all this on a whopping 626m2 (approx) of prime Craigieburn real estate.
Positioned to please in the heart of Craigieburn and within minutes to Craigieburn Plaza Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Train Station, local schools, childcare facilities, Malcolm Creek trails and much more.
An opportunity like this won't last, call now!

Description:
Exceptional Modern Living
Set in the most perfect position, a stone's throw away from schools, Craigieburn Central, Splash Centre, parklands and much, much more. Walk to all the amenities in just a few moments. Lead a convenient lifestyle or invest in this great opportunity today.
This three bedroom home offers value and convenience all in one package. With a natural light filled living area, kitchen and meals area opening up to the courtyard with a covered alfresco and ample outdoor space, this is perfect for that entertainer in you.
The kitchen is spacious and equipped with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, storage pantry and plenty of counter top space for that chef in your home.
Upstairs you are presented with 2 bedrooms with BIRs plus, a spacious Master bedroom, walk in wardrobe and an ensuite. The sparkling central bathroom services the remaining 2 bedrooms.
Additional features include:
- Ducted heating and split system cooling
- Double Car Garage
- Ducted vacuum
- Alarm system
- Video intercom
- Side drive through access
- Powder room
If location and luxury is what you are looking for, then look no further.

Description:
TITLED LAND READY TO BUILD !!!!!
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents a golden opportunity to secure this titled perfectly sized block of land 350m2 in Kinbrook estate ready to build your dream home.
A secluded community tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the city. The project's unique location means you're never far from everything you need.With Donnybrook Railway station just minutes from your front door, it's only a short 33 minutes and four stops to Southern Cross station in Melbourne's CBD. With a simple connection to the Hume Freeway, you can travel to surrounding areas with ease and with the CBD just a short 40 minute journey, you can stay connected while enjoying all the best qualities of a secluded community.
An enviable lifestyle awaits at Kinbrook. You and your family can explore the winding Merri Creek trail on your bike, make the most of Laffan Reserve and sporting grounds or relax with a picnic in the local park. With schools, shops, facilities, recreation centres and health facilities all just minutes away, there's no better place to call home. With a broad range of education options, you will find the ideal school for your children. A variety of child care and kindergartens along with primary, secondary and tertiary schools are located in Craigieburn and surrounding areas.
With major shopping precincts in nearby Craigieburn and Whittlesea, you'll find everything you need not far from home. As the project and area matures, you will be able to take advantage of shops and community facilities which are proposed within the Kinbrook masterplan and surrounding area. Kinbrook's enviable location not only provides the benefits of a quiet neighbourhood, but allows resident's easy access to a variety of transport options. From nearby Donnybrook station, you can reach Southern Cross in just 33 minutes and four stops on the train line. With easy connection to the Hume Freeway, Melbourne's CBD is just 40 minutes away, while Melbourne Airport is a short 30 minute drive.
Kinbrook is surrounded by an abundance of wide open spaces giving you the tranquillity to escape the busy world around you. With landscaped parks, sporting facilities and reserves, you will have the room you need to keep up a healthy and active lifestyle.
Specifications:
Size: 353sqm approx.
Frontage: 12.6m
Its right time to grab the opportunity and build your Dream home. Don't miss out! Call: Gordon Garg on 0433 897 397
Due Diligence Checklist
https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Easy-Living Style in the Heart of Mickleham
This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a quality built home in the highly desirable Botanical Estate. Immaculately presented, this north-facing home ideally situated within close proximity to local parks, has been designed to offer an easy lifestyle with minimal maintenance.
Comprising of four generous sized bedrooms, master with walk in robes & full en-suite. Additional 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, serviced by a central bathroom.
Open-plan living in the heart of the home, modern kitchen with stone benchtop, stainless steel appliances & walk-in pantry. Step outside to an ambient outdoor living area with a low maintenance backyard, perfect for all your entertaining requirements.
Additional features include the comforts of evaporative cooling & ducted heating, floor to ceiling tiles in both bathrooms, spacious laundry, LED downlights throughout, double remote control garage with internal access, exposed aggregate concrete driveway, fully manicured front & rear yard and much much more.
Perfect for the first home buyer or acute investor-this one won't last long, inspection is a must!
Call us today!
Preet Brar 0416 085 144
Simran Khatrha 0431 178 435

Description:
Perfect First Home or Investment.
Private inspections available - This well presented near new home is now looking for a new owner. finally you can secure a home in one of Melbourne's biggest growth suburbs. With all the features you have come to expect in a new home such as gas ducted heating, split system cooling and laminate timber flooring, you have a comfortable home for years to come. The numbers speak for themselves when you consider this home: at just over 12 months old you can still claim plenty of depreciation if you choose to invest, or claim the first home owners Grant if you choose to move in.
Why are so many people moving to Mandalay Beveridge? If not for the resort style living and facilities such as a swimming pool, gymnasium, restaurant and community centre, maybe it is for the award winning golf course? Maybe it is just for the lifestyle of community living within easy access to the Hume Freeway? Realistically, I would suggest it is the combination of all of these factors which are making people turn to Mandalay Beveridge for their next home.

Description:
Stylish Home with HUGE side access on 576 sqm block
**INSPECTION FOR THIS PROPERTY IS BY PRIVATE APPOINTMENT ONLY. PLEASE CONTACT SALLY LONG ON0477 437 281 FOR FURTHER INFORMATION**
This lovingly cared for and beautifully presented family home is ready move in and enjoy.
Upon entry you are greeted with the master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite. The remaining three bedrooms have built-in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom.
The home has 2 bright and spacious living areas and a superbly equipped open plan kitchen with breakfast bar showcasing stone benches, 900mm cook top and oven, stainless-steel dishwasher, walk in pantry with plenty of storage that's sure to please the cooking enthusiast. Stepping out to the rear of the home is a spacious, covered alfresco with a HUGE 4 metre concreted side access from the front, perfect for the caravan, boat, trailer or additional parking.
Other features include a 6.1 kw state of the art solar system for reduced electricity bills, Crimsafe security doors, study nook, floating floorboards, plenty of storage, carpet to the bedrooms & quality curtains & blinds the list goes on...
Situated among other quality homes and just a short drive to all the amazing amenities the well planned Club Mandalay has to offer; Including cafe, swimming pool, tennis courts, a gymnasium and golf course.
The Estate also offers a new primary school, childcare facilities, playgrounds and parklands, community centre, kindergarten and maternal health care centre, plus future plans for a retail precinct to accommodate facilities such as a supermarket and other specialty outlets.
Beveridge is less than 50km to Melbournes CBD via either the Hume Hwy or Vline train, so this home is perfect for those that need to easily commute but love that feeling of lifestyle living.
BOOK YOUR INSPECTION TODAY - THIS ONE WILL GO QUICK!
Internal area
213.67m²

Description:
Design Excellence with Quality and Versatility!!!
Impeccably stylish, fabulously sun-swept and immediately inviting, this spacious 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home offers superior single-level living with a special appeal to all. Superbly situated on block of 410m2(approx) with a stunning landscaped garden frontage.
Discover a sunlit kitchen and meals area featuring stainless steel appliances and extended island stone bench top, this home is sure to be a focal point for entertaining. The roomy comforts of open-plan living and dining spill outside to a positively peaceful undercover decked alfresco area. This home provides a welcoming and protected space that will be enjoyed for relaxed dining and entertaining all year round.
This magnificent 28sq (approx) home features the following:
* Master bedroom with a stunning Ensuite with double vanity, oversize shower, separate toilet, a massive walk in robe with shelving.
* Additional 3 large bedrooms with BIRs
* Spacious open-plan living and dining area
* Stylish kitchen with high gloss cabinetry, extended island stone bench top, mirrored splashback, 900mm gas cook top, oven, under mount range hood, dishwasher and an extra large walk in pantry.
* Separate laundry with plenty of cupboard space.
* Huge central bathroom with bathtub and a separate toilet.
* Undercover alfresco area with low maintenance backyard and sideyard.
* Remote-controlled double lock up garage with internal and rear access.
Packed with handy additions and special features include, 21 solar panels, 5 sensor alarm system, Hider hose ducted vacuum system, intercom, Security cameras x8, refrigerated multi-zoned heating and cooling installed with e-zone (controlled over the phone, each individually zoned rooms), Clipsal zen series electrical switches and power points, Crimsafe security doors and fly screens, communications board in garage, tv points and data points in every room, led lighting around mirror in en-suite, downlights throughout, sensored wall lights throughout the corridors, sensored pantry light, laminate timber flooring, tiles to ceiling in bathrooms and much more.
This property needs to be on your must see list!
Contact Lem Djemal on 0427 579 365 to register your interest and avoid missing out.

* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.
